captions.text:
Now this little monkey is what you call a
hero.

Yeah, a monkey saved the life of another monkey
who fell unconscious after being electrocuted
in India's northern city of Kanpur.

The monkey was electrocuted while walking
on high tension wires in the city's railway

The monkey fell down on the tracks and lost
consciousness, while the other monkey came

to the rescue. He tried to revive him by hitting,
biting and tipping him in water.

After more than 20 minutes, the electrocuted
monkey showed signs of life and started to

A crowd then gathered at the railway platform
to take pictures and videos of the heroic

title: Heroic monkey: Monkey saves 'dying' friend at train station in India

comments.text:
*Heroic monkey: Monkey saves 'dying' friend at train station in India*

This amazing video footage shows the moment a monkey rescued another monkey 
who fell unconscious after being electrocuted in #Kanpur ,  #India . 

The #monkey  can be seen trying to revive the injured monkey by licking, 
hitting, slapping and even throwing the other monkey into a concrete pit of 
rain water.

After about 20 minutes the monkey began to show signs of life.﻿

 the evidence for evolution is--- all - around you. the genome project  
that started in the 1990s challenged Darwin's theory and amazingly stood 
every test. imagine if Darwin could see his theory challenged at the 
cellular level, he would be so happy because it was his lives work.
